item.title: About Me
What's New
item.description: 6-DOF Servo Arm I, Arduino A Maker’s Coffee Table Eyantra Finals 2020 Highlights I, Arduino About Arduino Day is a worldwide birthday celebration of Arduino â€“ organized directly by the community, or by the Arduino team. It brings people together to share their experiences and learn more about the open-source platform. So this year, I coordinated with HatchnHack organized the I, Arduino event to acknowledge the open-source Arduino community who encouraged the people to make countless exciting projects over the years.
